page.title: 19UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: An unemployed youth.Miss H>Johnston has been unemployed for 4 weeks,and before she was unempoyed,she was a student at Yeovil College.She is looking for any office work or shop work and she thinks her chances of getting a job are good if she keeps trying.Helen thinks the job centre in Yeovil is quite good but could show more interest in the individual.She knows a few people who have now found a job through the centre,and they say that their personality was as important as their qualifications. Helen uses her time to write job applications and to do housework.She says there is a lot of competition for the few jobs offered in Yeovil.
